verdict.feature_description:
This feature automatically translates chat messages into the user's preferred language in real time.
It is used by users in a social chat app who speak different languages.
It removes language barriers and allows smooth communication without manually translating messages.
verdict.reasoning: The jurisdiction provided is India, and the feature is not geo-specific. The Jury Agent reports did not provide any conflicting information about this.

India.requirement_summary: The AI Auto Chat Translation feature collects and processes personal data, which must comply with Indian data protection laws.

regulations.citation: Section 43A of the Information Technology Act, 2000
regulations.snippet: ...personal information, whether collected or stored in electronic form, shall be protected against any unauthorized or unlawful access to, processing, disclosure, transfer, or disposal...
